data.name: Sherlock Holmes: The Devil's Daughter Costume Pack
data.detailed_description: Become the master of disguise with the Sherlock Holmes Costume Pack: add seven brand-new outfits, six types of beards and moustaches and a pair of glasses to the game’s original costumes. You can access the costumes at any time in the gamevia the famous detective’s wardrobe.
data.about_the_game: Become the master of disguise with the Sherlock Holmes Costume Pack: add seven brand-new outfits, six types of beards and moustaches and a pair of glasses to the game’s original costumes. You can access the costumes at any time in the gamevia the famous detective’s wardrobe.
data.short_description: Become the master of disguise with the Sherlock Holmes Costume Pack: add seven brand-new outfits, six types of beards and moustaches and a pair of glasses to the game’s original costumes. You can access the costumes at any time in the gamevia the famous detective’s wardrobe.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 8.1 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 540 2.4 GHZ / AMD Athlon II X3 445 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB 100% DirectX 11 compatible AMD Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 450 GTS or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 8.1 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2100 3.1 GHZ / AMD A8-7600 3.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048MB 100% DirectX 11 compatible ATI R9 270X / NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
